coredata.dc:title: Pricing and QoS
coredata.prism:publicationName: Lecture Notes in Computer Science (including subseries Lecture Notes in Artificial Intelligence and Lecture Notes in Bioinformatics)

abstract.ce:para: In this chapter the state of the art of pricing for Internet services and its relation to Quality-of-Service (QoS) is addressed. Essential economic and technology basics, covering terms, accounting, and security are followed by a user-centered view, a content-based scheme, and a cost sharing approach. © Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg 2003.

affiliation.affilname: France Télécom Division Recherche et Développement

item-info.copyright: Copyright 2019 Elsevier B.V., All rights reserved.

affiliation.organization: University of Federal Armed Forces Munich
Computer Engineering and Networks Laboratory TIK
Department of Digital Communications and Networks E6
University of Federal Armed Forces Munich

abstract.ce:para: In this chapter the state of the art of pricing for Internet services and its relation to Quality-of-Service (QoS) is addressed. Essential economic and technology basics, covering terms, accounting, and security are followed by a user-centered view, a content-based scheme, and a cost sharing approach. © Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg 2003.
